workflow.name: üîî Meta Ads Low Balance Alert ‚Äì Auto Notification via WhatsApp or Email
workflow.description:
### Hello my loves! I‚Äôm Amanda...
I created this workflow with care for marketing professionals and agencies who manage multiple **Meta Ads (Facebook)** accounts and want to track **ad account balances automatically** ‚Äî no more logging in every day or risking campaigns stopping unexpectedly.

With this setup, n8n will check the balance of each account using the Meta API, compare it to a defined threshold, and if the balance is too low, it will automatically send a friendly alert via **WhatsApp or email**. It also logs everything neatly into a **Google Sheet** ‚Äî so you always know where things stand.

---

## ‚ú® What this workflow does

- üßæ Pulls balance data from Meta Ads accounts using the Facebook Graph API  
- üìâ Compares current balance with the minimum threshold set in a Google Sheet  
- üö® Sends low-balance alerts via WhatsApp (Evolution API) or Gmail  
- üß† Customizes alerts depending on payment type: **Boleto or Credit Card**  
- üìä Updates the Google Sheet with new balance, check date, and status  
- üìÜ Can run automatically every day or manually whenever you want

---

## üîß What you‚Äôll need

1. A Google Sheet with your client accounts and minimum balance thresholds  
   ‚Üí Use this template: [Google Sheet Example](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wwjHif98Jyc8QUGZI15YI-Z68QXznIuMcK951AuUYdY/edit?usp=sharing)  
2. Access Token for Meta Ads API  
3. Evolution API (if you want to send alerts via WhatsApp)  
4. Gmail account connected to n8n (for email notifications)  
5. ‚ÄúBase Value‚Äù column filled out in the sheet for each account

---

## ‚úÖ Works with:
- **n8n Cloud**  
- **n8n Self-hosted**

üîê Secure credentials managed directly in n8n ‚Äî no exposed tokens.

---

## Want to adapt this workflow to your business?
‚ù§Ô∏è Buy Workflows: https://iloveflows.gumroad.com  
‚òÅÔ∏è Try n8n Cloud with my partner link: [https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/amanda](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/amanda)


---
## Translation to Portuguese:
### Ol√° meus amores! Eu sou a Amanda üåü
Esse fluxo foi feito com muito cuidado para profissionais que gerenciam contas de an√∫ncios no **Meta Ads (Facebook)** e precisam acompanhar de perto o **saldo dispon√≠vel**, evitando pausas indesejadas nas campanhas.

Com ele, voc√™ automatiza todo o controle de saldo: o sistema busca os dados da conta via API do Facebook, calcula o valor restante, compara com o limite definido, **envia alertas personalizados por WhatsApp ou e-mail** e ainda atualiza tudo em uma planilha do **Google Sheets** ‚Äî todos os dias, de forma segura e sem esfor√ßo.  

---

## ‚ú® O que esse fluxo faz

- üîÑ Busca automaticamente o saldo das contas via API do Meta Ads  
- üßÆ Verifica se o saldo est√° abaixo do valor base definido para cada conta  
- üü® Se estiver abaixo, envia alerta com mensagem personalizada para o cliente  
- üíå Alerta pode ser enviado por **WhatsApp (via Evolution API)** ou **Email (Gmail)**  
- üìä Atualiza a planilha do Google Sheets com o novo saldo e data da √∫ltima checagem  
- üí≥ Verifica se o m√©todo de pagamento da conta √© **boleto, PIX ou cart√£o** e envia mensagens diferentes para cada caso  
- üìÜ Funciona com agendamento autom√°tico di√°rio ou execu√ß√£o manual  

---

## üõ†Ô∏è O que voc√™ precisa

1. Uma planilha no Google Sheets com os dados das contas (use este [modelo](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wwjHif98Jyc8QUGZI15YI-Z68QXznIuMcK951AuUYdY/edit?usp=sharing))  
2. Conta de an√∫ncios no Meta configurada com token de acesso v√°lido  
3. API do Evolution (caso queira enviar alertas por WhatsApp)  
4. Gmail conectado no n8n (para envio de emails)  
5. Base Value (valor m√≠nimo desejado) preenchido na planilha para cada conta

---

## ‚úÖ Compat√≠vel com:
- **n8n Cloud**  
- **n8n Auto-hospedado**

üîê Seguran√ßa garantida com o uso de credenciais do pr√≥prio n8n.

---

## Quer adaptar esse fluxo pro seu sistema?
‚ù§Ô∏è Buy Workflows: https://iloveflows.gumroad.com  
‚òÅÔ∏è Use n8n Cloud com meu link parceiro: [https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/amanda](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/amanda)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
